justification: "Cultural orientation was assessed using the Individualism and Collectivism Scale (30) (e.g., 'I determine my own destiny' for individualism…)"
The same sentence notes that collectivism items (e.g., 'In general, I accept the decisions made by my group') come from the Individualism and Collectivism Scale.

"Need for cognition… was measured with the Need for Cognition Scale (31) (e.g., 'I would rather do something that requires little thought than something that is sure to challenge my thinking abilities')."

"Reflective and meta-cognitive styles and problem-solution focus were evaluated using the Situated Wise Reasoning Scale (32), assessing tendencies to reflect on events from an outsider's perspective… (e.g., 'Tried to see the conflict from the point of view of an uninvolved person')."
The same section states that the SWiS "recognize[s] diverse viewpoints" and includes items like "I looked for alternative explanations before forming my opinion," indexing meta-cognition.
The SWiS also "assess[es] ... problem solution focus (e.g., 'I looked for different solutions for this situation')."
